column5: This brand new Thai-style, private guesthouse is 1.4 miles (use our bikes!) from the Rockport beach, family-friendly activities, and the town center, making this a lovely place for couples, families, and business travelers. Youâ€™ll enjoy the comfortable and even luxurious accommodations inside of our Thai inspired cabin. The guesthouse is nestled between a mix of homes and trailers, but a high fence and gate provides you with your own hideaway. Check out possible discounts (see Description)!
